item.title: The Old Blog is Dead. Long Live the New Blog!
item.description: Why am I creating a new blog? What was wrong with the old blog? Why don’t I use Medium? The short version: The old blog is frozen in time, like a prince caught in amber 1 or a dandy in aspic 2. I can no longer post to it. The old blog, the Pivotal Engineering Journal, was archived a year after VMware acquired Pivotal. Every acquisition brings changes, and this was, in the scheme of things, a very minor one.
